DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter , single-arm clinical study evaluate safety effectiveness Cook 's permanent retrievable inferior vena cava ( IVC ) filter ( specifically , Günther Tulip® Vena Cava Filter Cook Celect® Vena Cava Filters ) patient need temporary permanent IVC filter placement prevention pulmonary embolism .
DOC.criteria: Requires temporary permanent IVC filter placement prevention PE Less 18 year age Allergy sensitivity device material contrast medium Pregnant planning become pregnant next 12 month Patient refuse blood transfusion At risk septic embolism Life expectancy le 12 month Existing IVC filter Duplicate IVC Anatomy would prevent safe filter placement ( e.g. , condition access vessel ) IVC diameter > 30 mm < 15 mm
